reviews.review:
Replayable any day.


I find my self replaying the Half-Life 2 series anytime, with friends using Synergy or by myself. Half-Life 2 is my favorite game hands down, and playing the episodes really brought my into the story even further. These games are timeless and are truly amazing.


TL:DR - Waiting for HL3.
Cliffhanger ending!  Looking forward to the next part of the story ;)

Awesome game Valve, this game series deserves a sequel, we would all appreciate it....I`ll be waiting patiently, if Half Life 3 comes out when I turn 95, I`ll still play it, arthritis and all :)

Премия: Игра, которая заслуживает продолжения! (GAME THAT DESERVES A SEQUEL)

Так как является одной из легендарных игр, продолжения которой ждут очень и очень многие игроки. А шутки даже известны за пределами гейм сообществ.

Episode Two takes everything that makes the Half Life franchise so great and brings it to the next level. Also, like everyone else has already said, you should nominate it for "Game That Deserves a Sequel".

Deserves a sequel. Because it's been too long.

It would seem some people are voting Half-Life 2 should have the suggested "sequel" award. While it's true that Valve stated that they no longer want to make "episodic" games, meaning the next game will be titled "Half-Life 3", technically this game and HL2: Ep 1 are sequels to Half-Life 2, so this game deserves the sequel award. We NEED a game that continues the story from where we were left hanging. Come on Valve, finish what you started. I don't care (that much) if you don't ever make games again, just so long as you don't leave us with a massive cliffhanger and unresolved plot climax.
To be continued...
GAME THAT DESERVES A SEQUEL

Игра, которая покорила миллионы душ геймеров. На то время, игра была шикарной, красивая графика, хороший и трогательный сюжет. К сожалению мы не сможем узнать о дальнейшей судьбе Фрименна и Аликса... Но я все же надеюсь что поиграю в Half-Life 3.
